3: In the present study, we report about qualitative and quantitative volumetric brain differences derived from structural MR imaging, focusing on lateral temporal and parietal lobe structures that might guide as neuro- morphometric biomarkers for distinguishing between health, MCI, and probable late onset AD.
Memory functions were assessed with subtests from the Wechsler Memory Scale-Revised in German
Spatial thinking was assessed with the Luria Mental Rotation Test
executive func- tions with a verbal (S-Words) fluency task
